one at the hospital's emergency department and one

serious problem that affected his mental health
and well-being.  The service of medical staff,
especially in emergency situations,
causes confusion and anxiety among
medical staff. Acts of assault on medical staff
are illegal acts that
need to be condemned by society.
The Department of Health will continue to

strengthen solutions to ensure
security and order at medical facilities.  Ensuring

Dong hospital in Australia, music therapy
actually helps
children patients become more mentally stable.
This method has also had a lasting positive impact
on
patients over the past 30 years.
Queensland divers used music therapy
to stabilize children's heart rates during and
after medical procedures.
Ten-week-old baby Ruby was
born with half of her heart underdeveloped.
Had to go through music therapy
when she was just 1 month old. The results
showed that music therapy brought many
benefits to little Ruby. She felt
more comfortable and at ease. She also fell asleep
very easily and was very calm.  In addition, the
baby's heart rate has decreased and is much more stable.
Dr. Jet Canell said that
this year the health of 750 children at the
hospital has improved from
music therapy in practice.  Nurses from
